column4: Hey, I have a weird problem with an old computer. The left column of the console wraps to the right. Can it be saved?
also, whenever something extensive is displayed on the console, it becomes broken (doesn't display when I type)
although i am not sure i understand your description, but the first thing that comes to my mind is maybe your having monitor problems and not pc problems
hum, no, the monitor is ruled out of the equation since it work with another pc
